creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: large torque made from a single hollow ring; ring is very large; center medallion with a frog-like creature; diamond shapes surround the frog; near the top on both sides is a small panel with a floral design; the ring curves over on itself on both sides, ending in a cone; connecting piece wrapped with thin wire and coiled wire
title: Torque
